firewall.name: Firewall
firewall.description: Creates a barrier that blocks unauthorized network traffic and filters packets based on security rules.

antivirus.name: Anti-virus Software
antivirus.description: Detects and removes malware from systems using signature and heuristic-based detection.

mfa.name: Multi-Factor Authentication
mfa.description: Requires multiple forms of verification beyond passwords, such as biometrics or one-time codes.

ids.name: Intrusion Detection System
ids.description: Monitors network traffic for suspicious activity and policy violations.

ips.name: Intrusion Prevention System
ips.description: Actively blocks malicious traffic and prevents exploitation of vulnerabilities.

training.name: Security Awareness Training
training.description: Educates users to recognize and avoid security threats through simulations and workshops.

segmentation.name: Network Segmentation
segmentation.description: Divides the network into isolated segments to contain breaches and limit lateral movement.

encryption.name: Data Encryption
encryption.description: Converts data into encoded format that can only be accessed with a decryption key.

acl.name: Access Control Lists
acl.description: Restricts system access based on user roles and permissions.

waf.name: Web Application Firewall
waf.description: Filters, monitors, and blocks HTTP traffic to and from web applications.

passwordless.name: Passwordless Authentication
passwordless.description: Uses biometrics, security keys, or passkeys instead of traditional passwords.

monitoring.name: Behavioral Monitoring
monitoring.description: Analyzes user activity patterns to detect anomalous behavior.

updates.name: Security Patching
updates.description: Regularly applies software updates to fix known vulnerabilities.

vpn.name: VPN (Virtual Private Network)
vpn.description: Creates encrypted tunnels for secure remote access to network resources.

backup.name: Backup & Recovery
backup.description: Creates and maintains secure copies of data for restoration after incidents.

ssl.name: SSL/TLS Certificates
ssl.description: Establishes encrypted connections between clients and servers, verifying server identity.

siem.name: SIEM System
siem.description: Security Information and Event Management system that provides real-time analysis of security alerts.

dlp.name: Data Loss Prevention
dlp.description: Detects and prevents data breaches, exfiltration, and unauthorized data transfers.

paramquery.name: Parameterized Queries
paramquery.description: Uses prepared statements with bound parameters to prevent SQL injection attacks.

sandbox.name: Security Sandbox
sandbox.description: Isolated environment for executing suspicious code without risking the main system.

edrendpoint.name: EDR Solution
edrendpoint.description: Endpoint Detection and Response tools that monitor endpoints for suspicious activities.

inputvalidation.name: Input Validation
inputvalidation.description: Verifies that input data meets expected formats before processing.

honeypot.name: Honeypot System
honeypot.description: Decoy system designed to attract attackers and study their techniques.
